title: New PS5, PS4 Games Incoming! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.01.20
description:
Gary Whitta and Greg run through PlayStation's nine new indies, talk about Xbox's awesome Summer Game Fest demo solution, and more!

Time Stamps - 
 00:00:00 - Start
00:04:40 - Housekeeping
BJ Writes In: With E3 Month now over, I was wondering how you guys felt about it. Was it good having all that news spread out? GAMESCAST @ 2 PM PT
Thursday and Friday: PREDATOR STREAMS! 3-5 pm. twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Conner Nolan, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:06:31 - PlayStation Indies!
00:39:40 - Crysis Remastered And Its Trailer Delayed, Steven Wright @ GameSpot
00:47:40 - Devolver Digital Showcase Announced
00:52:20 - XBOX SUMMER GAME FEST DEMO FUN TIMES
00:59:20 - Cyberpunk 2077 Ditches Wall Running, Lisa Dahlgren @ Game Reactor
01:00:00 - Out today
01:00:49 - Squad Up: The Nano Biologist
- You‘re Wrong
01:12:56 - Post Show 
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Blessing
